user.title: Set up Schellenberg USB Stick
user.description: Enter the serial port path for your Schellenberg USB stick.

usb_confirm.title: Confirm Schellenberg USB Stick
usb_confirm.description: Confirm the serial port path for your discovered Schellenberg USB stick.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the serial port

led_blink.title: Blink LED
led_blink.description: The LED on the USB stick will blink 5 times and then turn off.

calibration.title: Device calibration
calibration.description: Select a device to calibrate. Calibration will measure how long it takes for your blind to fully open and close.

calibration_confirm.title: Start calibration
calibration_confirm.description:
Calibration process for {device_name}:

1. The blind will close all the way down
2. Then we will time how long it takes to open (move up)
3. Then we will time how long it takes to close (move down)

This process may take several minutes. Press 'Start' to begin.

calibration_run.title: Calibrating...
calibration_run.description: Calibration in progress. Please wait while we measure the open and close times for your blind.

pairing.title: Pair a new device
pairing.description: Press the pair button to activate pairing mode on your Schellenberg USB stick. Then press the pairing button on your blind motor within 2 minutes.

name_device.title: Name your device
name_device.description:
Pairing successful! Device ID: {device_id}

Please provide a friendly name for this blind.

error.pairing_timeout: No device responded within 2 minutes. Please try again and ensure you press the pairing button on your blind motor.
error.calibration_timeout: Calibration timed out. The blind took more than 5 minutes to complete the movement. Please check the device and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during calibration. Please try again.

abort.no_devices: No paired devices found. Please pair a device first.
abort.device_not_found: Selected device not found in storage.

pair.name: Pair device
pair.description: Activate pairing mode on the Schellenberg USB stick to pair a new blind motor. After calling this service, press the pairing button on your blind motor within 10 seconds.
